  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    AliveController
    Controller to apply the Health Check pattern in case the app is deployed in a Microservice Architecture environment which might be useful for if Kubernetes is implemented
    AliveControllerTest  
    AltenChallengeApiError
    Custom API Error object that is returned to the user when something goes wrong.
    AltenChallengeException
    Custom Exception class to wrap most of the exceptions thrown by different application layers
    AltenChallengeExceptionAdvice
    Advisor class to manage certain Exception and transforms them into a friendly user response
    Application  
    Audit  
    AuditListener
    Entity Listener to intercept object instance of Audit to be persisted or updated with the goal of populate the audit fields (createdAt, updatedAt).

    Util Class containing the mapping methods to manage the different entities.
